Get SRS historical rating data

cfb_srs_ranking.Rd

Get SRS historical rating data

cfb_srs_ranking(year = NULL, team = NULL, conference = NULL)

Arguments

year

Year (optional)
team

Team information (optional)
confefence

Conference Abbreivation - S&P+ information by confderence

Examples


cfb_srs_ranking(year=2019)
